search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for TrueCoach (truecoach.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for TrueCoach's pricing page is: [https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/](https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing - TrueCoach =============== [Skip to content](https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/#content) Free Guide to Launching Your Personal Training Business! [Download Here](https://truecoach.co/learning-resources/launching-your-personal-training-business/) [![Image 5: Truecoach logo](https://truecoach.co/wp-content/themes/truecoach-child/assets/images/svg/logo/logo-truecoach.svg)](https://truecoach.co/ "TrueCoach logo") * [Solutions](https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/#) Back* [Physical Therapists](https://truecoach.co/physical-therapy-software/) * [CrossFit](https://truecoach.co/crossfit-software/) * [Functional Fitness](https://truecoach.co/best-functional-fitness-software-truecoach/) * [Bodybuilding](https://truecoach.co/bodybuilding-software/) * [Strength and conditioning](https://truecoach.co/strength-and-conditioning-software/) * [Education](https://truecoach.co/truecoach-for-the-classroom/) * [Weightlifting](https://truecoach.co/weightlifting-software/) * [Recreation Center](https://truecoach.co/best-recreation-center-software-truecoach/) * [Nutrition Coaching](https://truecoach.co/nutrition-software/) * [Occupational Therapy](https://truecoach.co/occupational-therapy-software/) * [Chiropractic Software](https://truecoach.co/chiropractic-software/) SOLUTIONS * [Features](https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/#) Back* [NEW! Wearables](https://truecoach.co/features/wearables/)  * [NEW! Public Profiles](https://truecoach.co/features/public-profiles/)  * [Program Workout Builder](https://truecoach.co/features/program-workout-builder/) * [Client Management](https://truecoach.co/features/client-management-communication-tools/) * [Personal Trainer Client Tracker](https://truecoach.co/features/personal-trainer-client-tracker/) * [Dashboard](https://truecoach.co/features/dashboard/) * [Video Exercise Library](https://truecoach.co/features/video-exercise-library/) * [Automated Payments](https://truecoach.co/features/personal-trainer-billing-software/) * [SEE ALL](https://truecoach.co/features/) FEATURES * [Pricing](https://truecoach.co/pricing/) * [Partner Perks](https://truecoach.co/partnerperks/) * [Resources](https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/#) Back* [Blog](https://truecoach.co/blog/) * [Learning Center](https://www.truecoach.co/learning-resources) * [Case Studies](https://www.truecoach.co/case-studies) * [Help Center](https://help.truecoach.co/) RESOURCES * [Login](https://app.truecoach.co/login/) * [Sign Up](https://app.truecoach.co/sign-up/) ![Image 6](https://truecoach.co/wp-content/themes/truecoach/assets/images/jpg/tc-banner-pricing-dk.jpg) Find The Right Plan For Your Personal Training Business ======================================================= Monthly Annuallysavings available! [The Starter Plan ---------------- $26.34/mo billed annually 1 MONTH FREE\* Try Starter Free ### _For individual trainers who are just getting started in digital coaching_ Up to **5 active clients** Program & Workout Builder Client Management Tracker MyFitnessPal Nutrition and Habit Tracker Client Dashboard 3,000+ Video Exercise Library In-App Messaging Free Automated Payments Try Starter Free](https://app.truecoach.co/sign-up/)[Most popular The Standard Plan ----------------- $57.99/mo billed annually 2 MONTHS FREE\* Try Standard Free ### _For growing fitness professionals looking to scale their business_ Up to **20 active clients** Program & Workout Builder Client Management Tracker MyFitnessPal Nutrition and Habit Tracker Client Dashboard 3,000+ Video Exercise Library In-App Messaging Free Automated Payments ### Plus: **New!** Public Coach Profiles Data Integration with Apple, Garmin, WHOOP, and other Wearables Custom-Branded Fitness App Advanced Habit and Nutrition Tracking Business Automations powered by Zapier Try Standard Free](https://app.truecoach.co/sign-up/)[The Pro Plan ------------ $136.99/mo billed annually 2 MONTHS FREE\* Try Pro Free ### _For established fitness businesses aiming to maximize the coaching experience_ Up to **50 active clients** Program & Workout Builder Client Management Tracker MyFitnessPal Nutrition and Habit Tracker Client Dashboard 3,000+ Video Exercise Library In-App Messaging Free Automated Payments ### Plus: **New!** Public Coach Profiles Data Integration with Apple, Garmin, WHOOP, and other Wearables Custom-Branded Fitness App Advanced Habit and Nutrition Tracking Business Automations powered by Zapier Try Pro Free](https://app.truecoach.co/sign-up/) Not ready to choose your plan? Try out everything TrueCoach has to offer with a 14-Day Free Trial! No credit card required. [Try For Free](https://app.truecoach.co/sign-up/) _\*Equivalent month(s) free when comparing the total cost of annual billing with the total cost of monthly billing._ **Each Plan Includes:** ----------------------- [**Program Builder** Build workout templates in under a minute that can be copied and pasted for multiple clients. Complete with 3,500+ professional exercise videos. Learn more](https://truecoach.co/features/program-workout-builder/) [**Progress Tracking** Explore TrueCoach's tracking tools to monitor client progress. Use our digital notepad to log key details like custom metrics, goals, equipment access, and nutrition. Clients can easily view progress with graphs and track their exercise history and custom metrics, helping them appreciate their journey and success. Learn more](https://truecoach.co/features/personal-trainer-client-tracker/) [**Nutrition and Habit Tracking** TrueCoach's integration with MyFitnessPal lets coaches set custom calorie, macro, and nutrition plans in one place. Pair this with Custom Habit Tracking to create personalized habits, like hydration and meditation, directly in clients' TrueCoach calendars for better engagement and accountability. Learn more](https://truecoach.co/features/personal-trainer-client-tracker/) [**In-App Messaging** Real-time messaging in TrueCoach lets you communicate with clients seamlessly, using GIFs, photos, and videos, all in one place. Clients can message you directly within the app while checking workouts, videos, or commenting on specific exercises—no need to switch between apps. Learn more](https://truecoach.co/features/client-management-communication-tools/) All prices are in USD. All annual plans are backed by our TrueCoach Guarantee. More than 50 clients? We’ve got special pricing for you. Email [support@truecoach.co](mailto:support@truecoach.co) to learn more. [See All features](https://truecoach.co/features/) Expand to see all features: ---------------------------
Mobile and Web App
Access your clients from anywhere with our dedicated iOS, Android, and Web app. 
Drag and Drop Workout Builder
Create any workout you can dream up, from AMRAPs to Strength Sets with our drag and drop workout builder
Workout Templates
Build workout templates in under a minute that can be copied and pasted for multiple clients.
Video Library
Our extensive video library comes pre-loaded with 3,500+ professionally recorded exercise demonstrations and allows you to add your own!
Real-Time Messaging
Touch base with your clients no matter where in the world they might be, whether to answer a workout-specific question or just to check in.
Notifications
With both push and e-mail notifications, you’ll never miss an update when a client completes a workout, leaves feedback, or sends you a message!
Habit Tracking
Create custom habits for your clients to complete on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis to allow them to excel in and outside the gym!
Macro Tracking
Track all aspects of your clients’ nutrition plans through our integration with MyFitnessPal. Set and monitor calorie and macro goals to keep your clients accountable in and outside of the gym.
In-App Messaging
Keep in touch with all of your clients with our dedicated coaching app.
Multi-Media Messaging Support
Keep your clients engaged and provide form cues with the ability to send pictures, videos, and even GIFs!
Client Onboarding
Onboard your clients in less than two minutes via e-mail or text with our seamless onboarding experience!
Client Organization
Filter your clients by name, program due date, and more to give attention where it’s needed.
Automated Payments
TrueCoach Payments, powered by Stripe, allows you to set up recurring payments to guarantee monthly income, and remove the need for that awkward Venmo request.
Wearables Integration (Exclusive to Standard/Pro)
Integrate directly with Apple Health/Apple Watch, Garmin, OURA, and more to monitor data on your clients’ wearables.
Automations Powered By Zapier (Exclusive to Pro)
Automate the busy admin tasks of your business with our custom triggers built in Zapier, allowing you to connect to thousands of your favorite apps.
Strengthen your Business with Valuable Add-Ons ---------------------------------------------- ![Image 7](https://truecoach.co/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2024/02/Asset-2@2x.png) The **NASM CEU Library** is a game-changer for coaches seeking continuous education. With **24/7 access to a vast array of Continuing Education Units (CEUs) via NASM CEU Libary**, coaches can now elevate their skills at a discounted rate of up to 33%. ### Benefits: * **Exclusive Discounts:** TrueCoach coaches enjoy significant savings of up to 33% on NASM CEU Library subscriptions. * **24/7 Access:** Accessible anytime, anywhere, the NASM CEU Library empowers coaches to learn at their own pace. * **Seamless Integration:** NASM CEU Library is seamlessly embedded into the TrueCoach app, ensuring a user-friendly experience for coaches. you need to successfully run your coaching business and manage clients online."** - Dr Marc Morris [watch full testimonial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MQjMBQPPjhM) [](https://www.truecoach.co/pricing/#ytnocookie-block_4f5839819d9aea8da9ecd6344418363e)![Image 10](https://truecoach.co/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2024/12/Screenshot-2024-12-26-at-09.51.35.png) Frequently asked questions -------------------------- What if I have more than 250 clients? ------------------------------------- That's awesome! [Contact us](mailto:hello@truecoach.co) to discuss custom pricing options. What happens if I want to upgrade/downgrade after purchasing? ------------------------------------------------------------- Any plan can be upgraded/downgraded at any time and this will be reflected on your next billing cycle. Is there an Annual Contract? ---------------------------- Our default agreement is month to month and you can cancel at any time. For additional savings, we have annual plans backed by our TrueCoach Guarantee! Are there any extra fees? ------------------------- Nope, what you see is what you get. What does this cost for my clients? ----------------------------------- Nothing! TrueCoach is 100% free for your clients. Anything else is just insanity. How do I get started? --------------------- Easy! Select which plan works for your business above and try it free during our 14-day trial. We'll see you on the other side! [**What is the TrueCoach Guarantee?** We are confident that TrueCoach will save you time and deliver a better experience to your clients while growing your training businesses. So confident, we have introduced the TrueCoach Guarantee. This unconditional 90-day money-back guarantee is for first-time subscribers signed up for an annual plan. If you are not satisfied with TrueCoach for any reason within the first 90 days, we will issue a refund. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference. You cannot opt-out of our First Party Strictly Necessary Cookies as they are deployed in order to ensure the proper functioning of our website (such as prompting the cookie banner and remembering your settings, to log into your account, to redirect you when you log out, etc.). For more information about the First and Third Party Cookies used please follow this link. [More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies) Allow All ### Manage Consent Preferences #### Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Active These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. #### Share Or Sale of Personal Data Share Or Sale of Personal Data Under the CPRA, you have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your personal information to third parties. These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. You may exercise your right to opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information by using this toggle switch. If you opt out we will not be able to offer you personalized ads and will not hand over your personal information to any third parties. Additionally, you may contact our legal department for further clarification about your rights as a California consumer by using this Exercise My Rights link.If you have enabled privacy controls on your browser (such as a plugin), we have to take that as a valid request to opt-out. Therefore we would not be able to track your activity through the web. This may affect our ability to personalize ads according to your preferences. * ##### Social Media Cookies Switch Label label These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools. * ##### Performance Cookies Switch Label label These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. * ##### Targeting Cookies Switch Label label These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. #### Share Or Sale of Personal Data Share Or Sale of Personal Data Under the CPRA, you have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your personal information to third parties. These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. You may exercise your right to opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information by using this toggle switch. If you opt out we will not be able to offer you personalized ads and will not hand over your personal information to any third parties. Additionally, you may contact our legal department for further clarification about your rights as a California consumer by using this Exercise My Rights link.If you have enabled privacy controls on your browser (such as a plugin), we have to take that as a valid request to opt-out. Therefore we would not be able to track your activity through the web. This may affect our ability to personalize ads according to your preferences. * ##### Social Media Cookies Switch Label label These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools. * ##### Performance Cookies Switch Label label These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. * ##### Targeting Cookies Switch Label label These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. ### Performance Cookies Clear checkbox label label Apply Cancel Consent Leg.Interest checkbox label label checkbox label label checkbox label label Confirm My Choices [![Image 28: Powered by Onetrust](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/powered_by_logo.svg)](https://www.onetrust.com/products/cookie-consent/) Discover the right TrueCoach plan to grow your personal training business. Start with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
